title: St Bernadine of Siena Novena
description: St Bernardine of Siena was a fifteenth century Italian Franciscan friar and preacher renowned for his eloquent preaching and his efforts to reform the clergy and the faithful. Pray this novena for advertisers, chest problems, Italy, gambling addicts, for peace and reconciliation, and public relations personnel.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Dear Lord, You gave Saint Bernardine a special love for the Holy Name of Jesus, a desire for all men to be converted to Christ, and an unwavering commitment to purity of speech and body. By the help of his prayers, may we always be alive with the spirit of Your love, and may he obtain from You the need we ask for, (mention request here‚Ä¶) We ask this through our Lord Jesus Christ, Your Son, who lives and reigns with You and the Holy Spirit, one God, for ever and ever. Amen. Prayer of St Bernadine Jesus, Name full of glory, grace, love and strength! You are the refuge of those who repent, our banner of warfare in this life, the medicine of souls, the comfort of those who mourn, the delight of those who believe, the light of those who preach the true faith, the wages of those who toil, the healing of the sick. To You our devotion aspires, by You our prayers are received, we delight in contemplating You. O Name of Jesus, You are the glory of all the saints for eternity. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Bernadine of Siena, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
